bug.short_desc: [UX] show skipped packages during upgrade with pkg param

long_desc.thetext:
[root@maxamillion-osbs ~]# rpm -q atomic-reactor atomic-reactor-1.6.0-2.fc24.noarch
[root@maxamillion-osbs ~]# dnf info atomic-reactor Last metadata expiration check performed 0:07:10 ago on Wed Dec 23 21:40:19 2015. Installed Packages Name : atomic-reactor Arch : noarch Epoch : 0 Version : 1.6.0 Release : 2.fc24 Size : 10 k Repo : @System From repo : rawhide Summary : Improved builder for Docker images URL : https://github.com/projectatomic/atomic-reactor License : BSD Description : Simple Python tool with command line interface for building Docker : images. It contains a lot of helpful functions which you would : probably implement if you started hooking Docker into your : infrastructure.
Available Packages Name : atomic-reactor Arch : noarch Epoch : 0 Version : 1.6.0 Release : 4.1.git.0.9c4344d.fc24 Size : 17 k Repo : maxamillion-atomic-reactor Summary : Improved builder for Docker images URL : https://github.com/projectatomic/atomic-reactor License : BSD Description : Simple Python tool with command line interface for building Docker : images. It contains a lot of helpful functions which you would : probably implement if you started hooking Docker into your : infrastructure.
Name : atomic-reactor Arch : src Epoch : 0 Version : 1.6.0 Release : 4.1.git.0.9c4344d.fc24 Size : 142 k Repo : maxamillion-atomic-reactor Summary : Improved builder for Docker images URL : https://github.com/projectatomic/atomic-reactor License : BSD Description : Simple Python tool with command line interface for building Docker : images. It contains a lot of helpful functions which you would : probably implement if you started hooking Docker into your : infrastructure.
[root@maxamillion-osbs ~]# rpmdev-vercmp 1.6.0-2.fc24 1.6.0-4.1.git.0.9c4344d.fc24 1.6.0-2.fc24 < 1.6.0-4.1.git.0.9c4344d.fc24
[root@maxamillion-osbs ~]# rpm -q atomic-reactor atomic-reactor-1.6.0-2.fc24.noarch
[root@maxamillion-osbs ~]# dnf update atomic-reactor --refresh Copr repo for atomic-reactor owned by maxamillion 87 kB/s | 35 kB 00:00 Last metadata expiration check performed 0:00:00 ago on Wed Dec 23 21:47:52 2015. Dependencies resolved. Nothing to do. Complete!
[root@maxamillion-osbs ~]# rpm -q dnf dnf-1.1.5-1.fc24.noarch

This turns out to be because a dependency was missing for the update. I still think it's a bug since dnf silently exited successfully.
# dnf install https://copr-be.cloud.fedoraproject.org/results/maxamillion/atomic-reactor/fedor a-rawhide-x86_64/00149886-atomic-reactor/atomic-reactor-1.6.0-4.1.git.0.9c4344d.fc24.noarch.rpm Last metadata expiration check performed 0:06:09 ago on Wed Dec 23 21:47:52 2015. Error: nothing provides python3-docker-scripts >= 0.4.4 needed by python3-atomic-reactor-1.6.0-4.1.git.0.9c4344d.fc24.n oarch (try to add '--allowerasing' to command line to replace conflicting packages)

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 24 development cycle. Changing version to '24'.
More information and reason for this action is here: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_Program_Management/HouseKeeping/Fedora24#Rawhide_Rebase
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.
I create huge refactor of problems report https://github.com/rpm-software-management/dnf/pull/782. Hope that it helps. It provides information about conflict or broken dependency like you use --best.
